User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.nablaml.com/sitemap.xml

# High priority content for search engines
Allow: /api/
Allow: /tutorials/
Allow: /examples/
Allow: /index.html

# Block build artifacts and unnecessary paths
Disallow: /_static/
Disallow: /_sources/
Disallow: /_build/
Disallow: /search.html
Disallow: /genindex.html

# Crawl delay to be respectful to search engines
Crawl-delay: 1
